import React, { useState } from "react" import "../assets/css/layout.css" import CkEditerKo from "./CkEditerKo" import Breadcrumb from "../components/common/breadcrumb" import axios from "axios" import CKEditors from "react-ckeditor-component" import Cookie from "js-cookie" const AddNotiGuide = () => { const [KoTitle, setKoTitle] = useState("") const [KoContent, setKoContent] = useState("") let form = new FormData() form.append("title", KoTitle) form.append("editor", KoContent) const cookie = Cookie.get("token") axios.post("/api/v1/notice/addG", form, { headers: { Authorization: cookie, }, }) return ( <>
제목입력
    {/* {' '} */}
) } export default AddNotiGuide
